entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
